name: SEG-Y Data File
summary: Learn about .SGY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SGY files are created by various seismic tools used to map and measure subsurface properties of the earth by sending a controlled energy signal and recording reflected waves, much like sonar devices. The SGY files can then be opened and viewed using various programs, such as Geopsy, and kogeo.
The SEG-Y format evolved from the SEG format, which was originally published in 1975 and is widely used in the geophysical industry.
NOTE: SEG files may also be saved as .SEGY files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
